episodes.title: I Actually Joined the Largest Cult Hiding in Plain Sight
episodes.description:
I really spent the last year of my life exploring one of the strangest, most mysterious movements on Earth. Why? Honestly… I have no idea anymore. I thought this channel was about my love of scams, but maybe I just love doing these insane things. 

I went undercover to explore a movement that some call a cult, others call a path to enlightenment, and some treat as their main source of news. What I found? A mess of park meditations, enigmatic leadership, media power plays, karma, aliens and more questions than answers.

This is an untold story: part investigation, part interview and part deep dive into a world of mind control tactics, alien visions, and unexpected links between dance shows, media empires, and global politics.

Now that the SEO stuff is out of the way, man this was wild. Like WILD. Thank you for clicking on this video, and thank you for watching! Let me know if you want to see more like this in the future and what your thoughts are on this whole mess in the comments.

ALSO yo, my bad Drake. I know this has nothing to do with you, but I cant get over it, like why would you say that? Shout out Kenrick. 
Also LEBRON!!!!!!!

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/ElijahLemard

Okay, here are the time stamps:
0:00 – Intro And Big Picture
1:23 – Japan! Pizza and Parades 
3:30 – Freedom?

6:50 – Time to watch some dancing
11:55 – Undercover Interviews
14:45 – What happened to make her join? Fire narratives 
18:50 – An invite? For me?
22:16 – How they be livin / book
24:52 – Li and his wheel
27:24 – 1999 part 1
30:50 – Time to reach out
32:06 – Thanks teach! / Documentary 
35:41 – Start of Jaya interview

41:31 – Crackdown 1999 part 2 
42:14 – What changed?
42:45 – How did he become involved in the news?
44:08 – Who did not have involvement? Li? Oh okay
45:20 – HOW MUCH MONEY DAWG WHAT?
46:20 – Oh that looks… uh….
46:47 – To the states
48:30 – He is up there
49:41 – Doubts
54:00 – Springs with Dragons
56:40 – What made him leave?
1:02:00 – End of Jaya Interview and what we are missing
1:03:35 – Where I started and why I don’t buy it
1:03:50 – Deep dive into evidence
1:11:11 – Petition 
1:14:03 – Another group
1:15:15 – What I think
1:15:56:– Reflection 
1:17:16  - Thank you so much!
